Protocols/LPThumbnailViewDelegate.html#/.name: thumbnailViewWasTapped(_:)
Protocols/LPThumbnailViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: This function is called whenever a LPThumbnailView determines a touch has happened.

Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.name: enterFromRight
Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.abstract: Animation which shows a temporary image entering from the right of LPThumbnailView then fades into the actual view.

Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.name: enterFromLeft
Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.abstract: Animation which shows a temporary image entering from the left of LPThumbnailView then fades into the actual view.

Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.name: enterFromTop
Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.abstract: Animation which shows a temporary image entering from the top of LPThumbnailView then fades into the actual view.

Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.name: enterFromBottom
Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.abstract: Animation which shows a temporary image entering from underneath of LPThumbnailView then fades into the actual view.

Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.name: crossDissolve
Enums/LPThumbnailViewAnimationStyle.html.abstract: Simply cross dissolves from the old image to the image animating to.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: delegate
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: The delegate responsible for listening to touches/updates propogated from this view.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: imageScaleMode
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: The scale mode to use for the imageView.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: automaticallyCalculatesCounterViewSize
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: Whether or not the size of the counter view should be calculated automatically.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: counterViewSize
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: The size of counter view and it’s label.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: counterViewTopSpacing
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: The amount of top spacing from the LPThumbnailView parent view to give to the counter view and label.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: counterViewTrailingSpacing
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: The amount of trailing spacing from the LPThumbnailView parent view to give to the counter view and label.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: counterViewLabel
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: An accessor for the label which displays the amount of images in the counter view.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: counterViewBackgroundColor
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: The background color for the counter view which counts the number of images in the view.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: counterViewAnimationOptions
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: The animation options used when animating the counter view label change.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: hidesWhenEmpty
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: Whether or not this view automatically hides it self when there are no images to display.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: addImage(_:duration:)
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: Adds an image to the images array and performs an animation.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: addImageWithContext(_:duration:)
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: Adds an image to the images array and performs an animation with context.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: removeImage(duration:)
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: Removes the last image in images and performs an animation.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: removeImage(at:duration:)
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: Removes the image in images at the specified index and performs an animation.

Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.name: removeImages(_:duration:)
Classes/LPThumbnailView.html#/s:15LPThum.abstract: Removes the images sent in from this views images array and performs an animation if and only if
